input.sentences: here is a man with a powerful sign .
the protestors are not letting this person get through .
here the protestors are blocking the road .
the police have to come and make sure the protestors stop standing on the streets .
output.sentences: The streets were full of people protesting.
They had signs with powerful messages.
Here the protestors are not letting this person through.
Ever passionate, the protesters continue blocking the road.
Protestors stop traffic by standing in the streets.
